data.name: csv-web-visualizer
data.description: Python Flask web app designed for efficient viewing of large CSV files.
data.readme:
# csv-web-visualizer 

a simple CSV file viewer with server-side processing using Flask and DataTables.



## features  

- server-side processing  
- search across all columns  
- sortable columns  
- custom input to set number of entries per page  



## installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/0sum-git/csv-web-visualizer.git
cd csv-viewer
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate # linux & macos :)
venv\Scripts\activate # windows :)
pip install -r requirements.txt
```



## usage  

```bash
python csv-web-visualizer.py yourfile.csv
```

open [http://localhost:5000](http://localhost:5000) in your browser. 



## requirements  

Flask >= 2.0
pandas >= 1.0
